exm.mng: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]
white radish, daikon, Raphanus sativus longipinnatus
fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
lit. every turnip to its hole (idiom), fig. each person has his own position, each to his own, horses for courses, every kettle has its lid
exm.pyn: yī gè luó bo yī gè kēng

exm.mng: Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable

exm.pyn: Háng zhōu luó bo Shào xīng zhòng

exm.mng: one man's meat is another man's poison (idiom), to each his own
exm.pyn: luó bo bái cài , gè yǒu suǒ ài

exm.mng: Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable
